tool.title: field
tool.about:
Example of a Rappture <field> object.
Fields are a set of values defined on a mesh of some sort (see <mesh> and <cloud> elements for details).
When you click the Simulate button, the inputs will be used to generate output fields.

about.label: Formula
about.description: Formula used to calculate the value of the field.

about.label: 3D Rendering
about.description: Determines the method used for 3D rendering--either the built-in Vtk library or the external nanoVIS engine.

about.label: Vtk library
about.description: This is the older visualization solution, implemented in Vtk and linked into the Rappture environment.

about.label: nanoVIS
about.description: This is the newer nanoVIS engine running on accelerated hardware in the nanoHUB environment.
